footer.description: The world's most futuristic and sophisticated platform to connect producers, buyers and carriers.

home.title: #1 in Brazilian Agribusiness
home.heroSubtitle: Marketplace + Freight + AI. Everything in one place for rural producers.

features.costReductionDesc: Our AI calculates the exact input dose, recommends the best purchase time and optimizes operations. Proven savings of up to R$ 7,000 per hectare!
features.weatherForecastDesc: Rain forecast for the next 15 days, ideal planting window, frost/drought alerts and climate risk by region. Avoid losses and plant at the right time!
features.profitSimulatorDesc: Calculate total crop cost, productivity projection, expected selling price and estimated net profit. See your ROI before planting!
features.marketplaceDesc: Buy and sell agricultural products: grains, inputs, machinery, animals. Own store system for producers and advertisers!
features.smartFreightDesc: Freight system with real-time GPS tracking, automatic emails, intelligent route calculation and driver matching
features.ratingsDesc: Complete evaluation system with 4 detailed criteria, automatic badges (Top Performer, Premium, Verified) and real-time statistics
features.aiChatDesc: Intelligent chatbot that answers about prices, freight, market, products and much more. Integrated voice and image recognition!
features.partnershipsDesc: Connect with other producers, freight forwarders and buyers. Private messaging system, partner search and professional networking
features.modernPaymentsDesc: Instant PIX, card in up to 12x and bank slip. 100% secure transactions with SSL certificate!
features.realTimeAnalysisDesc: Track grain quotes, market trends, weather forecast, agribusiness news and AI analysis to make better decisions
features.accessibilityDesc: Integrated VLibras for Brazilian Sign Language, screen reader support, high contrast and keyboard navigation. Inclusion for all!

ticker.title: Stock Ticker in Development
ticker.description: Soon we will have stock ticker available!

partner.description: Join the Brazilian agribusiness revolution and be part of the largest rural connectivity platform in the country.

about.heroDesc: Since 2023, revolutionizing agribusiness with advanced AI, blockchain and sustainable solutions. From small to large producers, our mission is to connect, optimize and transform!

hero.title: ABOUT AGROISYNC
hero.subtitle: Revolutionizing Brazilian agribusiness with technology and innovation

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Connect producers, buyers and transporters on a single, secure and efficient platform, using blockchain technology and artificial intelligence to revolutionize Brazilian agribusiness.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide our company
values.innovationDesc: We always seek the best technologies to revolutionize agribusiness
values.passionDesc: We love what we do and believe in the potential of Brazilian agribusiness
values.collaborationDesc: We believe that together we can build a better future for everyone
values.transparencyDesc: We always maintain transparency in all our operations

team.title: Meet the people behind AGROISYNC
team.agroisyncDesc: A dedicated team of professionals passionate about Brazilian agribusiness, working tirelessly to connect producers, buyers and transporters on a revolutionary platform.
team.techDesc: Our development team is constantly working to implement the most advanced technologies, including blockchain, AI and sustainable solutions for agribusiness.

milestones.ideaDesc: The AGROISYNC idea was created by friends passionate about agribusiness, aiming to revolutionize how producers and buyers connect in Brazil.
milestones.executionDesc: We started developing the platform focusing on sustainability, advanced technology and support for both small and large farmers.
milestones.implementationDesc: Launch of the complete platform with blockchain, AI, and all functionalities to transform Brazilian agribusiness.

features.sustainableDesc: We implement solutions that promote sustainable agriculture and efficient use of natural resources.
features.democratizationDesc: We connect small family producers to large buyers, creating equal opportunities for everyone.
features.globalDesc: We use the most advanced international technologies adapted to the Brazilian reality.
features.qualityDesc: Verification and certification system that guarantees the quality of commercialized products.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: We are here to help you transform your agribusiness with cutting-edge technology

agroconecta.title: AgroConecta
agroconecta.subtitle: Intelligent agricultural freight intermediation. We connect loads with transporters through our platform. We don't transport, we facilitate connections.

features.freightDesc: We connect loads with transporters through our intelligent platform
features.trackingDesc: Track your load from start to finish with advanced GPS technology
features.networkDesc: Thousands of transporters registered throughout Brazil
features.aiDesc: Our AI finds the best matches between loads and transporters
features.securityDesc: Secure transactions with guarantees for both parties
features.fastDesc: From agreement to delivery in hours, not days

howItWorks.title: How Our Freight Intermediation Works
howItWorks.step1Desc: Advertisers register their loads with origin, destination, weight and deadline
howItWorks.step2Desc: Our AI finds available transporters on the route and sends proposals
howItWorks.step3Desc: Advertiser and transporter negotiate directly through our private messaging

cta.title: Ready to Intermediate Your Freights?
cta.subtitle: Whether you are an advertiser or transporter, our platform connects you with the best freight partners. You negotiate directly, we just facilitate the connection!

chatbot.title: AI Assistant

consent.title: Privacy and Cookies
consent.body: We use cookies to measure audience (analytics) and, optionally, marketing. You can accept only analytics or reject everything. Your preferences will be saved for 180 days.

agroconecta.gpsTrackingDesc: Track your cargo 24/7 with satellite GPS technology. Know exactly where your product is at any time
